pages/HomePage.jsx.description: Main page for the shopify admin app.

pages/EditQuizPage.jsx.description: The page containing the form used for editing existing quizzes.

components/QuizForm.jsx.description: The entrypoint for the form used to create and edit quizzes.

components/InstallTab.jsx.description: The installation instructions for adding the quiz to the storefront.

question.description: Questions that are included in a quiz.

answer.description: Possible answers for a quiz question.

recommendedProduct.description: A shopifyProduct that is recommended to shoppers when they select an answer to a question.

quizResult.description: A shopper's email, along with a link to the products that were recommended to them based on their answers.

shopperSuggestion.description: A join table to handle the has-many-through relationship between quizResult and shopifyProduct.

shopifyProduct.description: Synchronizes and stores product data from connected Shopify stores.

shopifyTheme.description: Stores a boolean marking a theme as Online Store 2.0 or not.

shopifyAssets.description: Used to mark related Shopify themes as using Online Store 2.0 or 1.0.

create.description: When a quiz is created, we also generate a "ID"/slug (ie. My Cool Quiz -> my-cool-quiz).

delete.description: A cascading delete that also deletes a quiz's questions, answers, and recommended products.

create.description: We hook into this to find out which storefront version a shop uses, Shopify 1.0 or 2.0.

update.description: We hook into this to find out which storefront version a shop uses.

quiz.description: Quizzes can be seen by anyone who visits the shop, regardless of whether they are logged in.

quizResult.description: Shoppers can enter their email and submit to get product recommendations. Recommendations and emails are saved.

tenancy/shopifyTheme.gelly.description: Has been added so that merchants are only able to read themes from their store.

package.json.description: Holds a list of all the dependencies for the project.

index.html.description: The home, entrypoint and main file that's served.

webflow.title: Product Quiz
webflow.description: Recommend products to Shopify customers based on their answers to a quiz using Gadget.
